column.name: SFTGLX
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CASE WHEN T.LXJG IN ('1', '2') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM ECIF.LCIB_LXLCB T WHERE T.XMMC = ?",[XMMC]);
column.category: 项目终止入库申请信息

column.name: SFTGNH
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i=XMMC.KPJD;
if (i==111){
ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CASE WHEN T.nhJG IN ('1', '2') THEN  1 ELSE   0 END FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB T WHERE T.XMMC = ?",[XMMC]);
}else{
ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CASE WHEN T.nhJG IN ('1', '2') THEN  1 ELSE   0 END FROM ECIF.lcIB_NHLCB_DZBGCZ T WHERE T.XMMC = ?",[XMMC]);
}
column.category: 项目终止入库申请信息

客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致、该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行'
column.category: 上传公文附件

column.name: FJ
column.category: 上传公文附件

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'
column.category: 上传公文附件

column.name: FYYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("FYYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)");
column.category: 上传公文附件

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_XYZZSPLC_XSB' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_XYZZSPLC_XSB&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_CXXYSP' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0
column.category: OA审批信息
